title: Regular and special meetings
context: [ยง414D-143] Regular and special meetings. (a) If the time and place of a directors&rsquo; meeting is fixed by the bylaws or the board, the meeting is a regular meeting. All other meetings are special meetings. (b) A board of directors may hold regular or special meetings in or out of this State. &copy; Unless the articles or bylaws provide otherwise, a board may permit any or all directors to participate in a regular or special meeting by, or conduct the meeting through the use of, any means of communication by which all directors participating may simultaneously hear each other during the meeting. A director participating in a meeting by this means is deemed to be present in person at the meeting. [L 2001, c 105, pt of ยง1]
